name: arkguard
description: An obfuscator tools for open harmony apps.

scripts.lint: git status --porcelain=v1 | grep -E "^( M|A |\?\?)" | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's|^arkguard/||'  | grep '\.ts$' | xargs -I {} npx --prefix ./test eslint {} --config ./test/.eslintrc.json --fix
scripts.format: git status --porcelain=v1 | grep -E "^( M|A |\?\?)" | awk '{print $2}' | sed 's|^arkguard/||' | grep '\.ts$' | xargs -I {} npx --prefix ./test prettier --config ./test/.prettierrc --write {}
scripts.test: npm run test:ut && npm run test:grammar
scripts.benchmark: cd ./test && npm install && cd ../ && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --require ts-node/register --timeout=5000 ./test/benchmark/**/*.ts
